articles.author: Giorgio Leali
articles.title: Barnier makes last-ditch effort to prevent government collapse - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: “The moment is serious and difficult, but the challenge is not impossible,” the French prime minister said in a television interview.
articles.content: After being named prime minister in early September, Barnier said his priority was to bring down France’s budget deficit and get the country’s finances in order. To do so, he proposed a budget with 6… [+1328 chars]
